name: tl
description: Task management CLI for human+AI delivery teams

scripts.build: cd tl && GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -o ../binaries/tl-darwin-arm64 ./cmd/tl && GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../binaries/tl-darwin-amd64 ./cmd/tl && GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../binaries/tl-linux-amd64 ./cmd/tl && GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -o ../binaries/tl-linux-arm64 ./cmd/tl && GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../binaries/tl-windows-amd64.exe ./cmd/tl
scripts.prepack: chmod +x bin/tl.js binaries/tl-darwin-arm64 binaries/tl-darwin-amd64 binaries/tl-linux-amd64 binaries/tl-linux-arm64
